Cave diving
Main Skill: Mining
Max Efficiency: 230%

You bravely (or stupidly) dive into the dark, vast caves. This activity is one of the most dangerous in all of Arenum. It sure does make your heart pump and adrenaline fill your veins.

The Cave diving activity is a Mining activity.

Location

This activity can be done at the following location:

  • Underwater Cave in Syrenthia

Requirements

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Mining lvl. 55.
  • At least Agility lvl. 55.
  • At least Foraging lvl. 55.

Keyword Requirements:

  • Have Light source equipped.
  • Have Pickaxe equipped.
  • Requires [3] unique Advanced diving gear equipped.

Visibility

This activity is always visible.
